about_the_game:
Embrace the ancient art of ninjutsu in FortiFyte. Become your own ninja in a beautifully crafted open world, you will embark on a journey of self-discovery, facing formidable foes and uncovering hidden secrets. As you progress, work your way through the ranks to become the Kage, the leader of your own village, where you will manage resources, train new ninjas, and defend your territory from external threats.

Experience the thrill of being a ninja with fluid combat mechanics, dynamic parkour moves, and an array of customizable weapons and gear. The game's immersive environments bringing the ninja world to life, from serene bamboo forests to bustling feudal villages. Each mission is designed to test your strategic thinking and reflexes, ensuring an engaging and challenging gameplay experience. The village building and simulation aspect allows you to develop and customize your village, strategize its growth, and ensure its prosperity as you rise through the ranks to become a Kage.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent (minimum 4GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio Compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS or SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or equivalent (minimum 8GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio Compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD Required
